member.name: D2D1_CHANNEL_SELECTOR
member.summary: Specifies the color channel the Displacement map effect extracts the intensity from and uses it to spatially displace the image in the X or Y direction.

member.name: D2D1_CHANNEL_SELECTOR.D2D1_CHANNEL_SELECTOR_R
member.summary: The effect extracts the intensity output from the red channel.

member.name: D2D1_CHANNEL_SELECTOR.D2D1_CHANNEL_SELECTOR_G
member.summary: The effect extracts the intensity output from the green channel.

member.name: D2D1_CHANNEL_SELECTOR.D2D1_CHANNEL_SELECTOR_B
member.summary: The effect extracts the intensity output from the blue channel.

member.name: D2D1_CHANNEL_SELECTOR.D2D1_CHANNEL_SELECTOR_A
member.summary: The effect extracts the intensity output from the alpha channel.
